name: Shockgun
description:
You are a supersoldier in training, in a final, deadly course with a new weapon (unintentionally) developed by the military: the ShockGun. The weapon does not kill, but still has massive recoil which causes you to fly through the air. Run through 7 neon-tinted levels, with spikes, falling platforms, and high-knockback turrets in the best accidental platformer from 2021!

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Shoot: Left click
  • R: Start or retry a level

CREDITS:

John Park: Programming

Ethan Chevalier: Level Design, Voice Acting

B. Miller: 3D Modeling, SFX

Jack Pagano: Music
